snippet.title: Slopecrashers - Arcade Snowboarding is Coming - OTK Games Expo 2023 Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Here is a new gameplay trailer for Slopecrashers, the arcade combat snowboarding game, showcasing the latest footage as we are heading into Summer of Gaming with a special showcase during OTK Games Expo AND Future of Play Direct!

Slopecrashers is an arcade snowboard racer starring a wild crew of animals who embark on a world spanning tour to become snowboard champions! But oh no! Someone is trying to ruin their fun. 

I was inspired to make this game by old school classics like Snowboard Kids on N64 and SSX, so I hope with this game I am bringing something fresh to fans of those franchises, since we didn't really have an arcade snowboarding game with designed tracks in a long time.

Try the free demo and wishlist the game now on steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1619580/?utm_source=youtube

When the game is done, I definitely want to bring it to pc & consoles (nintendo switch, ps5, xbox), but nothing to announce regarding consoles yet - only PC is a given for now - but stay tuned for announcements and join the discord if you want to chat (Invite link is on the website https://www.slopecrashers.com)

--------------------------------------------------
MUSIC: The music in this trailer (and also in the game) is done by Benedict Nichols - https://www.benedictnichols.com/
--------------------------------------------------

I hope you enjoy the latest trailer and stay tuned for updates on the social media channels!

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/byteparrot
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/byteparrot
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/byteparrot
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/byteparrot
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@byteparrot

Behind the scenes on my private channels (peekstone):

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCejqsUBleehDMoUCMiEH7mA
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/peekstone
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/peekstone

#slopecrashers #byteparrot #upcomingswitchgames #ssx #otkgamesexpo #snowboardkids #ssxtricky #otkgamesexpo2023 #ssx3 #upcominggames #coopgames #shredders #ridersrepublic #upcominggames2024 #nintendoswitch2 #otk #indiegames #indiegames #nintendoswitch #upcominggames2023 #ps5 #ps4 #xbox #nintendoswitch #nintendoswitchgames
